title: Drawing, "Prudence", 1816
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink: Prudenza.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Woman with helmet shown seated and peering in looking glass at which putto beside her points. Another putto looks at snake which surrounds her left arm.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Prudence", 1816.
1816. Pen and brown ink, brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3247.
